PROJECTS

My Dotfile May, 2016

  • Created dotfiles to backup, restore and sync personal preferences and settings of toolbox.
  • Picked homebrew as default Mac OSX package manager, vim as default text editor, zsh as default login shell and git as default version control with symbolic links for sake of traceability and flexibility.
  • Created scripts to bootstrap the installation of those dotfiles and their dependencies.

Online Flight Reservation System Apr, 2015

  • Achieved the mapping from problem domain to solution domain according to RAD (requirement analysis doc).
  • Implemented the system design using Java Web technology with MVC architectural pattern.
  • Built multiples services on top of RESTful APIs and validated the system with automation and manual tests.

Writing In Air (android application), Worcester, MA Apr, 2015

  • Designed an android app to keep track of user writing hand movements (single alphabetical).
  • Applied multiple sensors (including linear acceleration, gravity, magnetic) to convert the user input to digital signals and used filters to decrease noise
  • Implemented the UI design and used multiple threads for user interaction, sensor event monitoring (handler), and back-end access (IntentService)
